TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class TcpChannel Implements IChannelReceiver, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type TcpChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelSender interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 提供使用 TCP 协议传输消息的信道实现。

span.span: Provides a channel implementation that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 通道传输跨远程处理边界 (例如, 在应用程序域中的计算机之间) 的消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers on application domains). 类是一个便捷的类, 它将类和类的功能结合起来。 The class is a convenience class combining the functionality of the class and the class. 通道由 .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端调用远程对象时, 调用将被序列化为客户端通道发送并由服务器通道接收的消息。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后对其进行反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回值由服务器通道传输并由客户端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要对消息进行其他处理, 可以指定的实现, 并通过它传递的所有消息。To perform additional processing of messages, you can specify implementations of the and through which all messages processed by the are passed. 对象具有关联的配置属性, 这些属性可在运行时在配置文件中设置 (通过调用静态方法) 或以编程方式 (通过将集合传递到构造函数)。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关通道配置属性的详细信息, 请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 如果服务器计算机运行的是 Windows 95/98/Me, 则不能将该服务器指定为安全服务器。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the server cannot be specified as secure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用设置远程处理服务器及其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 该示例包含三个部分: 服务器、客户端和服务器和客户端使用的远程对象。The example contains three parts, a server, a client, and a remote object used by the server and the client. 下面的代码示例演示了一个服务器:The following code example shows a server: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/server.cs#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了此服务器的客户端:The following code example shows a client for this server: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例显示了服务器和客户端使用的远程对象:The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/common.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/common.cs#20)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，仅激活客户端信道，不激活服务器信道。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, activating only a client channel, and not a server channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数将所有字段初始化为其默认值。The parameterless constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 如果使用无参数构造函数, 则该通道仅作为客户端通道运行, 而不会侦听任何端口。If the parameterless constructor is used, the channel functions only as a client channel, and does not listen on any ports. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 port) cil managed

param.name: port
param.span: 服务器信道侦听的端口。

span.span: The port on which the server channel listens.

summary.span: 使用侦听指定端口的服务器信道初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a server channel that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要请求远程处理系统代表您选择打开的端口, 请指定端口 0 (零)。To request that the remoting system choose an open port on your behalf, specify port 0 (zero). 这将创建一个实例, 以便在动态分配的端口上侦听请求。This will create a instance to listen for requests on the dynamically assigned port. 通常在客户端上执行此操作, 以确保正在侦听回调方法。This is typically done on the client to make sure that a is listening for callback methods. 如果将0传递到构造函数 , 则实例化为使用可用端口。If 0 is passed to the constructor the is instantiated to use a free port. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates using this method. 若要请求动态分配可用端口, 请将`port`参数设置为零。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to zero. [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/CS/server.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/VB/server.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider clientSinkProvider, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider serverSinkProvider) cil managed
Public Sub New (properties As IDictionary, clientSinkProvider As IClientChannelSinkProvider, serverSinkProvider As IServerChannelSinkProvider)

param.name: properties
param.span: 一个 集合，它为客户端和服务器信道要使用的配置属性指定值。

span.span: A collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the client and server channels.

param.name: clientSinkProvider
param.span: 客户端信道要使用的 实现。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the client channel.

param.name: serverSinkProvider
param.span: 服务器信道要使用的 实现。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the server channel.

summary.span: 使用指定的配置属性和接收器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息, 请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 如果服务器计算机运行的是 Windows 95/98/Me, 则不能将该服务器指定为安全服务器。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the server cannot be specified as secure. 信道接收器提供了一个插件点, 该插件点允许访问流过通道的基础消息, 以及用于将消息发送到远程对象的传输机制所使用的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收器还负责在客户端和服务器之间传输消息。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 通道接收器在链中链接在一起, 并且所有通道消息在最终序列化并传输消息之前都流过此接收器链。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果不需要接收器功能, 请将`clientSinkProvider`和`serverSinkProvider`参数设置为`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2/CS/server.cs#1)]

exception.span: 所提供的信道属性的格式不正确。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管作为的实例返回, 但可以将此属性的值强制转换为说明对象所侦听的通道的实例。Although returned as an instance of , the value of this property can be cast to an instance of describing the channel to which the object listens. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的通道都具有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 此名称用于在调用时检索特定通道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . 若要设置属性, 请将值分配给传递给构造函数的字典中的 "名称" 索引属性。To set the property, assign the value to the "name" indexed property in the dictionary passed to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/server.cs#3)]

abstract member CreateMessageSink : string * obj * -> System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink override this.CreateMessageSink : string * obj * -> System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含新信道消息接收器的 URI，该信道消息接收器将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 将消息传递给指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回将消息传递到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or channel data object. 如果参数为`null` ,`remoteChannelData`则将用作接收器的目标。 `uri`If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 或参数可以为, 但`null`不能同时为两者。 `remoteChannelData` `url`Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. 信道接收器提供了一个插件点, 该插件点允许访问流过通道的基础消息, 以及用于将消息发送到远程对象的传输机制所使用的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收器在链`ChannelSinkProviders`中链接在一起, 并且所有通道消息都流过此接收器链, 然后才会序列化并传输消息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of `ChannelSinkProviders` and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要显式设置此属性, 因为它足以设置的 ensureSecurity 参数。This property need not be set explicitly, as it is sufficient to set the ensureSecurity parameter of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Optional initialization information.

summary.span: 指示当前信道开始侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无需调用此方法即可开始在新初始化的通道上进行侦听。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 在调用方法后, 使用此方法重新启动对通道的侦听。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called. 如果频道使用动态分配的端口号, 则在重新启动侦听时, 端口号可能会改变。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. `data`参数可用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果你不希望将特定状态传递到通道, 请将设置`data`为。 `null`If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 该信道的可选状态信息。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示当前信道停止侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法停止在通道上进行侦听。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新启动侦听, 请使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果频道使用动态分配的端口号, 则在重新启动侦听时, 端口号可能会改变。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. `data`参数可用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果你不希望将特定状态传递到通道, 请将设置`data`为。 `null`If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
